base.name: RateLimiter
base.description: Passes through the input but constrains the derivative of the output to be between the upper and lower derivative limits.

parameter_definitions.name: enable_dynamic_upper_limit
parameter_definitions.description: User selection for enabling inport for upper limit derivative value.

parameter_definitions.name: upper_limit
parameter_definitions.description: upper limit impose on the output derivative

parameter_definitions.name: enable_dynamic_lower_limit
parameter_definitions.description: User selection for enabling inport for lower limit derivative value.

parameter_definitions.name: lower_limit
parameter_definitions.description: lower limit impose on the output derivative
